scripts.deploy: yarn run start_localstack && yarn run setup && yarn run dropdb && yarn run createdb && yarn run migratedb
scripts.deploy_arm: yarn run start_localstack && yarn run setup_arm && yarn run dropdb && yarn run createdb && yarn run migratedb
scripts.setup_arm: EXTRA_CORS_ALLOWED_ORIGINS=* LAMBDA_MOUNT_CWD=$(pwd) DNS_ADDRESS=0.0.0.0 GATEWAY_LISTEN=0.0.0.0:4566 serverless deploy --param architecture=arm64 --verbose
scripts.start_localstack: yarn run create_localstack && yarn run restart_localstack
scripts.create_localstack: docker-compose -f ./docker-compose.yml up  --force-recreate -d localstack || echo 'Failed to start LocalStack'
